title: The Tomb of the Silver Serpent

sections.title: Village Edge
sections.readaloud: Old Maera meets you by a standing stone: “Bring back the idol and hush the hill.”
sections.body:
Roll Reaction p.3 or use an Influence roll p.24 as a Quick Contest p.3.

Optional trail: Hiking p.22-23 · Fatigue basics p.31

sections.title: Sink-Stairs
sections.readaloud: Collapsed stone stairs spiral into dark.
sections.body: Tie rope; roll Climbing p.22 (start; then each 5 min). Apply Encumbrance p.22. Failure → Falling p.31; Jumping help p.23.

sections.title: Whispering Antechamber
sections.readaloud: Faint sibilant whispers drift from ahead.
sections.body: Hearing p.24 to parse. Then a chill passes—make a Fright Check p.24 (+2 if Combat Reflexes p.9).

sections.title: Hall of Echoes
sections.readaloud: The ceiling is webbed with bats.
sections.body: Use Stealth vs. Hearing p.24 as a Quick Contest p.3. If swarmed, consider All-Out Defense p.25-27.

sections.title: Barred Door & Crawl
sections.readaloud: Cold air hisses through iron bars. A wall crack beckons.
sections.body:
• Pick: Lockpicking p.14; spot with Vision p.24. Fail & prick → Poison p.32.
  • Force: your ST as a Quick Contest p.3 vs Door 13 (crit fail: lose FP p.31).
  • Crawl: Vision p.24 + Climbing p.22 (Flexibility helps p.9); back out with Ready p.25-27.

sections.title: Ember Room
sections.readaloud: Four braziers and a serpent relief with four fire-icons.
sections.body: Flame hurts: Flame p.32 (ignite; put out with Ready p.25-27). Heat drains FP: Heat p.32, Fatigue p.31.

sections.title: Prisoner
sections.readaloud: Tavi, a sickly tomb-robber, pleads for help.
sections.body: Reaction p.3 or Influence p.24. Spores as Disease p.31-32. Treat with First Aid p.30.

sections.title: Serpent Shrine
sections.readaloud: Scales rustle around a coiled stone idol…
sections.body:
Silver Serpent: ST 13, DX 12, HT 12; HP 13; Basic Speed 6.00 (Move 6), Dodge 9; DR 2. Bite 1d-1 imp + poison p.32 (HT−3; 1 tox/min ×6). Tail 1d-1 cr. Uses All-Out Attack p.25-27 at times; fears fire.

  • Turn Sequence p.25; pick maneuvers p.25-27.
  • Dodge/Parry/Block p.28 (Dodge from p.6).
  • Apply DR & wounding modifiers p.29.
  • Injury thresholds p.29-30; low FP penalties p.31.
  • After: First Aid p.30.

sections.title: Idol & Collapse
sections.readaloud: The plinth’s idol (~15 lb) triggers a rumble when lifted.
sections.body: Spot seams: Vision p.24. Flee 5 turns. Recalc Encumbrance p.22. Gap (3 yd): Jumping (skill) p.14 / DX; distance rules p.23. Fail → Fall p.31, then Climb p.22.

sections.title: Exit & Return
sections.body: Hiking p.22-23 for the march. Finish poison cycles p.32. Tomorrow’s disease cycles & remedies p.31-32. Back in town: Reaction p.3 or Influence p.24.
